Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for analytics, including data sources, reporting needs, and performance expectations. Identify key stakeholders and use cases.
Design the architecture for Microsoft Fabric Analytics, including data ingestion, storage, processing, and visualization components.
Set up the Microsoft Fabric environment, including workspace creation and resource allocation for analytics workloads.
Set up data ingestion pipelines to bring data from various sources into Microsoft Fabric. Ensure proper data transformation and validation processes.
Apply security best practices, including data encryption, access control policies, and integration with Azure Active Directory for authentication.
Create analytics models using Microsoft Fabric tools to process and analyze data. Ensure models are optimized for performance and accuracy.
Set up dashboards and reports to visualize analytics data. Ensure they meet stakeholder requirements and are easy to interpret.
Perform testing of analytics workflows to ensure data accuracy, performance, and reliability. Validate results against expected outcomes.
Set up monitoring and alerting for analytics processes using Microsoft Fabric tools. Configure alerts for data pipeline failures and performance issues.
Document the analytics architecture, configurations, and operational procedures. Ensure documentation is accessible to relevant teams.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the Microsoft Fabric Analytics setup.
Implement regular auditing procedures to ensure compliance with security and performance standards.
